fulltext: oai:lindat.mff.cuni.cz:11372/LRT-281;2016-04-06T16:39:54Z;hdl_11858_00-097C-0000-0007-710A-A;hdl_11858_00-097C-0000-0007-710B-8;OpenStreetMap Extended API;REST-style web service that can return relevant geographical information (including toponyms, which is probably the most relevant for CLARIN) given a specific area as input Especially useful in combination with http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Osmosis to carve out certain areas based on pre-defined polygons (e.g. country boundaries).;2014-07-30;toolService;http://hdl.handle.net/11372/LRT-281;downloadable_files_count: 0;http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Osmxapi#Tag_Query
name: 648705e3-55dc-55fb-b50f-8da0604218f3
notes: REST-style web service that can return relevant geographical information (including toponyms, which is probably the most relevant for CLARIN) given a specific area as input Especially useful in combination with http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Osmosis to carve out certain areas based on pre-defined polygons (e.g. country boundaries).
title: OpenStreetMap Extended API
